name: Web Services CT
description:
Web Services CT is a one-stop-shop for Small & Medium-Sized Business Web Design & Digital Marketing services.  We offer a wide array of Digital Marketing Services to help your business create a presence online and generate business via the web.
We specialize in the following for Connecticut, and New England area, businesses:
Website Design
Search Engine Optimization (SEO)
Social Media Marketing
Email Marketing
Graphic Design
PPC Advertising
We take pride in offering a high quality product at an affordable small business price as we too are a small business.
